item.title: The Science Behind Full-Text Search Engines
item.description: Recently I started using Elasticsearch, which is one of the most known search engine. The things it allows to do fascinated me. That’s why I dove into informational retrieval (IR), the science behind it. It’s a huge topic, and a silver bullet for search engines doesn’t exist. It is user needs and expectations that tailors the model and the process to find information. This user-centric vision to measure the quality of an IR system captured me.
